Vahli Dikri Yojana.description: Improve the status of the girl child in Gujarat by promoting education and well-being.
Vahli Dikri Yojana.benefits: Financial assistance of Rs. 1,10,000 across three installments.
Vahli Dikri Yojana.eligibility: First two girl children in family, resident of Gujarat, family income ≤ Rs. 2 lakh, girl born on or after Aug 2, 2019.
Vahli Dikri Yojana.application_process: Apply via online portal, Anganwadi center, or Gram Panchayat office.
Vahli Dikri Yojana.documents_required: Birth certificate, income certificate, Aadhaar card.

Mukhyamantri Amrutum Yojana.description: Health insurance scheme for families below poverty line providing financial protection for critical illnesses.
Mukhyamantri Amrutum Yojana.benefits: Cashless treatment up to Rs. 3 lakh, transportation allowance Rs. 300.
Mukhyamantri Amrutum Yojana.eligibility: BPL families, later extended to families earning ≤ Rs. 4 lakh.
Mukhyamantri Amrutum Yojana.application_process: Open enrollment year-round via official website and helpline.

Niradhar Vrudhha Pension Yojana.description: Financial support pension for destitute senior citizens lacking support.
Niradhar Vrudhha Pension Yojana.benefits: Monthly pension of Rs. 1,000 (varies by rural/urban).
Niradhar Vrudhha Pension Yojana.eligibility: 60+ years, destitute, income ≤ Rs. 1.2 lakh rural / Rs. 1.5 lakh urban.
Niradhar Vrudhha Pension Yojana.documents_required: Age proof, income certificate, ration card, Aadhaar.

Mukhyamantri Yuva Swavalamban Yojana.description: Pension scheme providing financial assistance to eligible widows.
Mukhyamantri Yuva Swavalamban Yojana.eligibility: Widow, Gujarat resident, aged 18-40, family income ≤ Rs. 1.2 lakh, not remarried.
Mukhyamantri Yuva Swavalamban Yojana.application_process: Offline via Mamlatdar office or Village Computer Entrepreneur.

Kanya Kelavani Yojana.description: Promote girl child education with incentives and scholarships.
Kanya Kelavani Yojana.benefits: Free education and scholarships for girls from primary to higher secondary.
Kanya Kelavani Yojana.eligibility: Girls from Gujarat, family income below a specified limit.
Kanya Kelavani Yojana.application_process: Through government schools and enrollment drives.

Vandan Matru Yojana.description: Maternity benefit scheme providing financial assistance to pregnant and lactating women.
Vandan Matru Yojana.benefits: Financial assistance of Rs. 4,000 in stages during pregnancy and breastfeeding.
Vandan Matru Yojana.eligibility: Pregnant/lactating women in Gujarat, family income ≤ Rs. 2 lakh.
Vandan Matru Yojana.application_process: At Anganwadi centers and health facilities.

Bal Sakha Yojana.description: Healthcare for newborns to reduce infant mortality.
Bal Sakha Yojana.benefits: Expert neonatal care, immunizations, nutrition advice, free services.
Bal Sakha Yojana.eligibility: Newborns in BPL families, tribal areas, or government healthcare institutions.

Swarnim Gujarat Scholarship Scheme.description: Scholarships to promote higher education for meritorious students from economically weaker backgrounds.
Swarnim Gujarat Scholarship Scheme.benefits: Tuition fee reimbursement and monthly maintenance allowances.
Swarnim Gujarat Scholarship Scheme.eligibility: Gujarat domiciles, minimum qualifying marks, family income limits.

Ganga Swaroopa Yojana.description: Financial assistance for widows to support dignified livelihood.

Mukhyamantri Mahila Utkarsh Yojana.benefits: Not fully detailed in provided info.
